column4: Just installed ubuntu server; learning to admin it. When I login and it tells me "18 packages can be updated. 1 update is a security update." What are the apt commands to list and/or install those?

You can install it seperately, afterwords. But it will get removed if nothing is using it. And I believe that is the most ideal situation, otherwise you'd be overflowing with stuff you didn't have a need for anymore. =o
Uhh.. We don't quiz people. We're community helping community. =P
